Can you please let me know the previous tichet this eas for?
To start the logs on Mac you can follow the steps below.
1. cd /var/log
2. sudo touch eppclient.log
3. sudo touch eppsslsplit.log
4. sudo launchctl unload /Library/LaunchDaemons/com.cososys.eppclient.launchdaemon.plist
5. sudo launchctl load /Library/LaunchDaemons/com.cososys.eppclient.launchdaemon.plist

Kind regards

>

> send the .ZIP archive to us.
>

> For MAC:
>
> It is possible to create log files for the EPP Mac agent and DPI via
> terminal with the following commands:
>
> sudo /bin/launchctl unload
> /Library/LaunchDaemons/com.cososys.eppclient.launchdaemon.plist
> sudo touch /private/var/log/eppclient.log
> sudo touch /private/var/log/eppsslsplit.log
> sudo /bin/launchctl load
> /Library/LaunchDaemons/com.cososys.eppclient.launchdaemon.plist
>
> The first command will terminate the EPP client, the second and third
> commands will create the EPP client and the DPI logs respectively and the
> fourht command will restart the EPP agent.
